TopicTitle: "Lesser flats" listed amongst "Flats" in Science Archives

Articles.Content:
This is a pretty straight forward bug in the Science Archives. All science reports done in the Lesser Flats, Great Flats or Greater Flats (Minmus) are listed in the Flats section as well.

**Edited <time datetime="2015-07-25T22:11:57Z" title="07/25/2015 10:11  PM" data-short="8 yr">July 25, 2015</time> by Yoha**

This is a recognised bug that has been present since biomes and the science archive was introduced. Hopefully, given the UI overhaul for Unity 5, this will get sorted out when the science archive is rewritten...
It's a well known bug, and I don't think the UI updates will fix it themselves. It's an issue with the code used to construct the lists.
